verbose_text: To understand the molecular basis of this phenotype, we used whole mount in situ hybridisation to examine the expression of genes including Xbra (expressed in mesoderm), Chordin (Chd : chordamesoderm), Goosecoid (Gsc : dorsal mesendoderm), Sonic hedgehog (Shh : chordamesoderm), Sox3 (neurectoderm) and Sox17a (endoderm) (XREF_FIG a-x).
evidence: expression of genes including Xbra (expressed in mesoderm), Chordin
